docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

test for any and emoji

docs.title: Admonition demo
docs.text:
Example of admonitions/callouts with a title:

高血鉀處置

Calcium gluconate 1amp IVP

D50W 1~2amp IVP

Kalimate 1 pack TID~QID, consider with 5pack in N/S 100ml enema

高血鉀處置

Calcium gluconate 1amp IVP

D50W 1~2amp IVP

Kalimate 1 pack TID~QID, consider with 5pack in N/S 100ml enema

docs.title: Flowchart
docs.text:
graph TD
    A[Christmas] -->|Get money| B(Go shopping)
    B --> C{Let me think}
    C -->|One| D[Laptop]
    C -->|Two| E[iPhone]
    C -->|Three| F[fa:fa-car Car]

docs.title: 高血鉀處置流程
docs.text:
graph TD
    A[發現血鉀 > 5.5 mmol/L] --> B{血鉀 ≥ 6.5 mmol/L<br>或 ECG 異常?}
    B -->|是| C[立即心肌穩定化<br>→ 給 10% Calcium gluconate 10 mL IV over 2–5 min]
    C --> D[評估心電圖變化<br>→ 可每5–10分鐘重複一次（最少間隔30分鐘）]
    B -->|否| E[排除假性高血鉀（溶血、標本問題等）]
    D --> F[促進細胞內移動]
    E --> F

docs.title: Sequence diagram
docs.text:
高血鉀處置 
sequenceDiagram
    participant Alice
    participant Bob
    Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you?
    loop Healthcheck
        John->>John: Fight against hypochondria
    end
    Note right of John: Rational thoughts <br/>prevail...
    John-->>Alice: Great!
    John->>Bob: How about you?
    Bob-->>John: Jolly good!
